alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 22 at 5:01PM MST until December 22 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been extended until 7 PM today for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 229 which includes Huerfano County... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 229... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED FOR |GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 229... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels, which is in effect until 7 PM MST this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 229. * Winds...West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Temperatures...Around 50. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
